text: Nimen zenme bu wei zhenzhu er shishe ne? Tiandi de yichan, zhishi zhenzhu de. Nimen zhong zai shengli zhiqian shishe erqie canzhan zhe, yu zai shengli zhihou shishe erqie canzhan zhe, bushi pingdeng de, qianzhe bi houzhe pin ji geng gao. Zhenzhu yi zui you de baochou yingxu mei pai ren, zhenzhu shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de.
